item.title: 随着盈利增长和估值回落，全球资金重返印度股市
item.description: 二月份，外国投资者购入价值逾25亿美元的股票。【原文：Foreigners have bought over $2.5 billion worth of shares in February.】

item.title: 内地投资者因盈利失望抛售香港股票
item.description: 内地投资者正加速撤离香港上市股票，这表明他们对科技巨头无法将人工智能支出转化为盈利增长感到不耐烦。【原文：Mainland Chinese investors are accelerating their exit from Hong Kong-listed shares, signaling impatience with big technology firms’ inability to translate artificial intelligence spending into earnings growth.】

item.title: 印度经济增长可能超出当前预期——数据修订后
item.description: 印度本财年经济增速可能高于此前预期，因政府推出新的产出计算框架，凸显出这个全球人口最多国家在全球贸易动荡中的韧性。【原文：India’s economy may grow faster than previously estimated this financial year as the government unveils a new framework for calculating output, highlighting the resilience of the world’s most populous nation to global trade disruptions.】

item.title: 奈飞投资者对放弃收购华纳兄弟的决定表示欢迎
item.description: 奈飞公司以失败告终，却赢得了胜利。【原文：Netflix Inc. just won by losing.】

item.title: 印尼贪腐案中"汽油教父"之子被判有罪
item.description: 印尼一家国有能源企业卷入的170亿美元腐败案中，一名隐居石油商人的儿子被判入狱。该商人曾主导印尼燃料贸易数十年。【原文：The son of a reclusive oil merchant who dominated Indonesia’s fuel trade for decades received a prison sentence as part of a $17 billion corruption case centered on the country’s state-owned energy firm.】

item.title: 菲律宾比索因股市资金流入及美元走弱，有望创14年来最佳开局
item.description: 菲律宾比索正迎来2012年以来最强劲的年度开局，因股市外资流入及美元走软提振了该国货币。【原文：The Philippine peso is set for its best start to the year since 2012, as foreign inflows into the stock market and a weak US dollar bolster the currency.】

item.title: 新加坡上市企业UI宝盛房地产投资信托拟募资7.7亿美元
item.description: 新加坡宝盛集团旗下的房地产投资信托基金已开始接受投资者认购其首次公开募股（IPO）的订单，此次募资规模可能高达9.736亿新元（约合7.7亿美元），这标志着该国近年来规模最大的IPO之一正式启动。【原文：The real estate investment trust of Boustead Singapore Ltd. has started taking investor orders for an initial public offering that may raise as much as S$973.6 million ($770 million million), kicking off what is slated to be one of the city-state’s largest offerings in recent years.】

item.title: 第一资源公司在印尼土地整治行动中支付560万美元罚款
item.description: 棕榈油生产商第一资源有限公司因被要求将土地移交印尼政府而支付了560万美元，这是大宗商品公司受到全面打击影响的最新迹象，该打击行动已使大片土地归国家控制。【原文：Palm oil producer First Resources Ltd. paid $5.6 million in connection with land it was required to hand to the Indonesian government, the latest sign of how commodities companies are being affected by a sweeping crackdown that’s brought vast areas under state control.】

item.title: Centerview与Redbird助力派拉蒙赢得华纳竞购战
item.description: 派拉蒙天空舞影业公司以1110亿美元成功竞购华纳兄弟探索公司，这场胜利为协助科技业继承人戴维·埃里森击败奈飞公司的六家顾问公司赢得了重大胜利。【原文：Paramount Skydance Corp.’s winning $111 billion bid for Warner Bros. Discovery Inc. is a coup for the half-dozen advisory firms that helped technology heir David Ellison top Netflix Inc.】

item.title: 三星首席运营官称暂无计划推出新款iPhone Air竞争机型或三折屏手机
item.description: 三星电子仍在评估是否推出另一款超薄智能手机，此前该公司去年推出的首款超薄机型Galaxy S25 Edge销量相对"较低"，不及该公司其他手机产品。【原文：Samsung Electronics Co. is still evaluating whether it will release another super-thin smartphone after sales of its inaugural attempt, last year’s Galaxy S25 Edge, were comparatively “lower” than the company’s other handsets.】

item.title: 旗舰支持的生物医药公司Generate在首次公开募股中筹集4亿美元
item.description: 生成生物医药公司通过首次公开募股筹集了4亿美元，其股票定价处于市场预估区间的中心点。【原文：Generate Biomedicines Inc. raised $400 million in an initial public offering, pricing its shares at the midpoint of the marketed range.】

item.title: 中国通过削减做空人民币成本来抑制人民币升值
item.description: 中国加大了抑制人民币升值的力度，取消了衍生品市场中做空人民币的额外费用。【原文：China stepped up efforts to temper the yuan’s advance by removing the additional charge for betting against the currency in the derivatives market.】

item.title: 阿波罗私募信贷基金对不良贷款组合进行减记
item.description: 由阿波罗全球管理公司管理的私募信贷基金削减了股息，并下调了其资产价值，因其部分贷款组合出现压力迹象。【原文：A private credit fund overseen by Apollo Global Management Inc. cut its dividend and marked down the value of its assets amid signs of strain in parts of its loan book.】

item.title: 英国消费者信心指数下滑，GfK称因失业担忧加剧
item.description: 英国消费者信心指数连续三个月首次下滑，失业率攀升与家庭预算紧张的阴云笼罩着经济前景。【原文：UK consumer confidence declined for the first time in three months as rising unemployment and stretched household budgets loomed over the economic outlook.】

item.title: 东京CPI降温至低于日本央行目标水平，为2024年以来首次
item.description: 东京通胀指标放缓至逾一年最低水平，因首相高市早苗推行的公用事业补贴政策抑制了家庭能源支出。这给日本央行带来沟通挑战，因该行正寻求推进加息进程。【原文：A Tokyo inflation gauge eased to the slowest pace in more than a year as Prime Minister Sanae Takaichi’s utility subsidies curbed household energy costs, posing a communication challenge for the Bank of Japan as it looks to proceed with interest rate hikes.】

item.title: 随着更多核谈判计划出台，油价趋稳，美军集结
item.description: 在周四一轮会谈后，美国与伊朗同意下周继续举行核谈判，油价随之企稳。与此同时，美国在中东的大规模军事部署令市场持续紧张。【原文：Oil steadied after the US and Iran agreed to more nuclear talks next week following a round of discussions on Thursday, as a huge deployment of American forces in the Middle East kept the market on edge.】

item.title: 金价基本持平，因美国与伊朗同意延长核谈判
item.description: 在美伊双方同意延长核谈判后，金价趋稳，但中东地区爆发冲突的可能性仍令市场保持警惕。【原文：Gold steadied after the US and Iran agreed to prolong nuclear talks, keeping markets on edge about the potential for conflict in the Middle East.】

item.title: 根据新规，OpenAI本会标记加拿大大规模枪击案嫌疑人
item.description: OpenAI公司向加拿大议员表示，根据最新更新的政策，该公司本会将一名被封禁的ChatGPT用户移交警方处理——该用户后来成为该国史上最严重大规模枪击案之一的头号嫌疑人。【原文：OpenAI Inc. told Canadian lawmakers it would have referred a banned ChatGPT user who later became the chief suspect in one of the country’s worst-ever mass shootings to police under newly updated policies.】

item.title: 日本两年期国债发售受关注，投资者审视日本央行前景
item.description: 日本周五发售的两年期国债将揭示市场对这种政策敏感型债券的胃纳，投资者正密切关注日本央行释放的最新信号。【原文：Japan’s sale of two-year government bonds on Friday will reveal the appetite for the policy-sensitive debt as investors deliberate over the latest signals from the Bank of Japan.】

item.title: 腾讯支持的经纪商瞄准日本期权市场扩张
item.description: 数字经纪商Moomoo Securities Japan Co.计划扩大日本股票单只股票期权业务，以满足该国散户投资者日益增长的需求。【原文：Moomoo Securities Japan Co., a digital brokerage, plans to expand its business in single-stock options for Japanese equities to capitalize on growing demand from the country’s retail investors.】

item.title: 全球资金重返印度，因盈利前景改善
item.description: 外国投资者正以八个月来最快的速度重返印度股市，企业盈利趋稳以及美印贸易协议改善了未来数月的市场前景，为其提供了支撑。【原文：Foreign investors are returning to Indian stocks at the fastest pace in eight months, supported by stabilizing corporate earnings and a US trade deal that improves the outlook for the months ahead.】

item.title: 安普瑞克拒绝五角大楼最新提议，拒绝化解人工智能项目争端
item.description: 人类本位PBC公司拒绝了五角大楼为化解僵局提出的最新方案。此前该公司一直要求军方在使用其人工智能软件时遵守特定条款，这场对峙已危及该公司为政府提供的国防业务。【原文：Anthropic PBC rejected the Pentagon’s latest offer to defuse a standoff over conditions the company has sought governing the use of its artificial intelligence software by the military, a confrontation that has jeopardized its defense work for the government.】

item.title: 奈飞放弃竞购华纳兄弟，派拉蒙成为赢家
item.description: 奈飞公司退出对华纳兄弟探索公司的收购战，为竞争对手派拉蒙天舞公司扫清障碍，后者最终以1110亿美元成功拿下这家历史悠久的好莱坞制片厂。【原文：Netflix Inc. dropped out of the fight to buy Warner Bros. Discovery Inc., clearing the way for rival bidder Paramount Skydance Corp. to clinch its $111 billion deal for the historic Hollywood studio.】

item.title: 亚洲股市将回落，英伟达下跌令市场情绪低迷：市场综述
item.description: 人工智能再度令交易员屏息凝神，英伟达公司股价表现平淡令市场情绪转冷，尽管其业绩符合预期；与此同时，软件公司股价小幅反弹，美国国债价格走高。【原文：AI again transfixed traders as a lackluster day for Nvidia Corp.’s stock dulled sentiment despite its in-line results while software companies staged a minor rebound and Treasuries gained.】

item.title: 从加拉加斯看特朗普的委内瑞拉计划
item.description:
今日《大事件》播客聚焦：特朗普曾宣称将在今年1月捕获尼古拉斯·马杜罗后"接管"委内瑞拉。那么实际情况如何？

【原文：

On today’s Big Take podcast: Trump said the US would “run” Venezuela after capturing Nicolás Maduro in January. What’s actually happened since?

item.title: 无人机制造商克拉托斯防务公司寻求通过股票发售筹集10亿美元
item.description: 克雷托斯防务与安防解决方案公司正计划通过股票发售筹集10亿美元资金，此举正值政府加大国防开支之际。【原文：Kratos Defense & Security Solutions Inc. is seeking to raise $1 billion in a share sale, as government spending on defense ramps up.】

item.title: Coupang因数据泄露影响加剧意外亏损
item.description: Coupang公司第四季度意外亏损，凸显出这家韩国电商巨头在核心市场遭遇大规模数据泄露后面临的经营压力。【原文：Coupang Inc. reported a surprise loss in the fourth quarter, underscoring the strain facing the company following a massive data breach in South Korea, its main market.】

item.title: CoreWeave股价下跌，巨额支出令投资者担忧
item.description: CoreWeave公司股价在盘后交易中一度暴跌13%，此前该公司公布的亏损额超出预期且资本支出激增，引发市场对其基础设施过度支出的担忧。【原文：CoreWeave Inc. fell as much as 13% in late trading after reporting a bigger-than-expected loss and boosting capital expenditures, spurring concerns about the company overspending on infrastructure.】

item.title: 戴尔预测人工智能服务器热潮将推动2027年销售额达500亿美元
item.description: 戴尔科技公司对人工智能服务器的年度销售额给出了超出预期的展望，这表明对推动人工智能数据中心建设的核心设备需求持续强劲。【原文：Dell Technologies Inc. gave an outlook for annual sales of its artificial intelligence servers that exceeded estimates, a sign of continued strong demand for machines central to fueling the AI data center build-out.】

item.title: 贝恩资本的鲁菲诺警告称，软件违约率风险可能达到两位数
item.description: 贝恩资本指出，随着人工智能引发的颠覆性影响不断扩大以及贷款到期日临近，软件行业违约率面临飙升至两位数的风险。【原文：Software default rates are at risk of soaring into double digits as disruption from artificial intelligence spreads and loans come due, according to Bain Capital.】
